name: Charge of the Righteous
text: You charge toward undead and fiends with confidence in your righteous cause.
prerequisites: Base attack bonus +1, any good alignment.
benefit: You do not take a penalty to AC while charging undead creatures and evil outsiders.
normal: When you charge, you take a –2 penalty to AC until the start of your next turn.
staminaText: When charging any creature with an evil alignment, you can spend 2 stamina points in order to ignore the –2 penalty to AC imposed by charging.
